title: Claudio Rocha
content:
Born: Brazil, 1957

Type designer and Brazilian delegate to the Association Typographique Internationale [ATypI](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108012146/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ATypI). He is publisher of [Tupigrafia](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108012146/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tupigrafia), the first magazine dedicated to typography and calligraphy in Brazil.

Claudio has designed the fonts ITC Gema, ITC Underscript.
author: James Grieshaber
